events.name: SupplierConfirmed
events.description: Captures the event of a supplier confirming the delivery of a batch.

events.name: BatchQualityChecked
events.description: Records the quality check of a batch, triggering a report generation.

events.name: TemperatureAnomalyDetected
events.description: Captures an event where a temperature anomaly during transport is detected.

events.name: SupplierAuditCompleted
events.description: Records completion of an audit for a supplier.

commands.name: ConfirmDelivery
commands.description: Captures the event of a supplier confirming the delivery of a batch.

commands.name: GenerateQualityReport
commands.description: Records the quality check of a batch, triggering a report generation.

commands.name: AlertTemperatureIssue
commands.description: Captures an event where a temperature anomaly during transport is detected.

commands.name: FinalizeAudit
commands.description: Records completion of an audit for a supplier.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagementContext
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Supplier Management context for supplier confirmations.

integrationPoints.name: QualityControlContext
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Quality Control context for batch quality checks.

integrationPoints.name: TemperatureMonitoringContext
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Temperature Monitoring context for anomaly alerts.
